title: Strengthening Hospitality Practice Competencies: Integrating Sociocultural Issues in IDT Courses: Simulation-Based

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three instructional design frameworks that incorporate cultural diversity elements into science education scenarios.
Learners can apply two instructional strategies suitable for addressing sensitive sociocultural topics in VR simulation environments.
Learners can collaboratively establish criteria for prioritizing sociocultural issues in the IDT (Instructional Design and Technology) process through teamwork.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
